//HOLES
#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int T;
	scanf("%d", &T);
	while(T--){
		int count = 0;
		char c[101];
		cin>>c;
		for(int i = 0; i < strlen(c); i++){
			if(c[i] == 'A' || c[i] == 'D' || c[i] == 'O' || c[i] == 'P' || c[i] == 'R'  || c[i] == 'Q')count++;
			else if(c[i] == 'B')count+=2;
		}
		printf("%d\n", count);
	}
	return 0;
}
